title: The best meat thermometer is finally back on sale
text:
The best meat thermometer is finally back on sale

Get this incredible meat thermometer at a great price in this exclusive color. (Photo: ThermoWorks)

Perfectly searing a steak or properly cooking a Thanksgiving turkey can be next to impossible, even if you're a whiz in the kitchen. And if you don't want to ruin dinner (yet again), then you should seriously consider investing in a high-quality meat thermometer. Right now, you can get one of the best meat thermometers on the market for an incredible price.

The Thermoworks Thermapen Mk4 is typically on the expensive side at $100, but right now you get it for $15 off in the limited edition sky blue color. But don't let this meat thermometer's high price tag scare you away because it comes with incredible performance. We found that the Mk4 can read temperatures in just 2 seconds and was the most accurate meat thermometer among all the models we tested.

And that's not all. This model comes with bunch of exciting features like an automatic backlight when you're grilling at night, a 360-degree rotating display, and automatic on/off when you extend the probe. It's a pit master's dream and is recommended by celebrity chefs and food bloggers alike.

Plus, with this price drop, it's also the perfect time to get one as a gift for the home chef or grill master in your life. Or you can splurge on yourself to assure you don't wind up with a dry bird on Thanksgiving.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
